website_summaries.verdict: A pack of 12 genuine Intex replacement filters (Type A) for Intex's smaller above-ground pool pumps.
pros: These Intex filters will work with a variety of pump models
They measure 8 inches tall by 4.25 inches in diameter and do not have a place to deposit chlorine tablets
cons: Although these filters are not that durable, the 12 filters in this pack will be more than enough to get you through a season

customer_reviews.title: They work better than store bought ones.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why exactly however the end rubber pieces seem to slide onto the pump much easier and stay in place better than the store bought ones I've used in the past. They are also easier to clear with a normal pressure water hose. Would suggest to anyone. Great product and great pricing. I bought these for roughly $2.50 each and the large box store was around $5 each.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Summer Waves above ground pool owner here
customer_reviews.text: I have a summer waves polygroup 16x48 above ground pool with the stock filter/pump. They work well for when you need to turn your pump on, but when it came time to vacuum my pool, all the debris just fell straight through and went back into my pool. I have to have my husband vacuum while I hold a nylon/filter saver on my outlet to catch the debris. It does not have the basket inside like the Summer Escapes filters. Overall I am happy. If I could have found the summer escapes filters in this quantity for this price, I would have bought those instead, but these will do until next summer when walmart gets them in again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cut the inner ring out for the correct size.
customer_reviews.text: These filters are for two different sizes of pump. If you are looking to use them for the larger of the sizes take a razor blade or scissors and cut out the smaller ring size inside and it will fit perfectly for the larger sized pumps. The filters themselves last as long as any other brand, but the resting that has to happen before they fit costs them a star in this review.
customer_reviews.author: The Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Good price, ok quality, ok filtration.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, cheap filters, last about a 2 weeks. Only complaint is that one had a crack in it and almost was unusable but the other end was ok so I used it for the bottom and put the broken side up and it stayed together for the whole 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Johns

customer_reviews.title: Filters collapse on themselves, fold inwards.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the first 2 filters collapse in on themselves. I do not change my filter every day, but rinse them off daily and reuse. I have never had an intex filter do this, I guess the inner core must be solid, not 2pieces as these appear to be. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: David Waples

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase a sand filter because after a while these cartridges become very expensive. And depending on how hard your pool water is you can clean the filters and get more than one use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas aka Dad

customer_reviews.title: One ring two many
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for a long time and their quality has always been good. Only thing is, you have to cut the inner ring for many pumps. Not sure why one end can not be precut so one end for for A pumps and one end for the C pumps.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product for the price. They tend to want to collapse under heavy use although they never became unusable.
customer_reviews.author: klick000

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: These last longer than any other filter I’ve used. They are easy to install. I can see exactly where to position it for an easy fit
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the fastest and least expensive way to purchase these filters for my small above ground pool. The filters work efficiently and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good value for $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Good value I believe. They work great and would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: much better price to buy by the dozen and I have them at hand when I need one
customer_reviews.author: marleen huggins

customer_reviews.title: I'm switching to sand
customer_reviews.text: My problem is these clog to the point of not working SO often. People claim to clean and reuse... good luck with that. Personally I'm going to invest in a small sand filter, I don't think these are up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: El Duderino

customer_reviews.title: A season's worth of filters in one order. Use ...
customer_reviews.text: A season's worth of filters in one order. Use the box to store the dry used ones until you can brush them out to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Papaw Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great and are way cheaper to buy on here then at my local stores!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality at Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Use a lot of them each summer for the above ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jemapet1012

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Summer Escapes type c filter systems
customer_reviews.text: Item description "fit Summer Escapes type c filters". It does not. It has no inner Circle catch
customer_reviews.author: Our family

customer_reviews.title: This was a good deal for these filters
customer_reviews.text: This was a good deal for these filters. But I would recommend getting a sand filter. You will save more in the end.
customer_reviews.author: MoHustle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fit right into my pump..Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great deal on the filters
customer_reviews.text: you cant beat the price and they work very well, with the price of these filters you can change them more often and not worry about trying to clean an old one to save money it keeps the pool cleaner..great item
customer_reviews.author: Nickro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best price I've found so far and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they were good to have on hand and lasted me awesome I love
customer_reviews.text: every time I need a filter I had them last all summer long
customer_reviews.author: lorie briggs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fair value at the price, worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Witt's Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than I can get in the store and are actually A filters, not the A or C filters, so they fit better than what's available in stores.
customer_reviews.author: MoTownStacks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit ok have to cut out center to fit my pump.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money .fits a 530gps intex pump
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and work great as a replacement filter for my spa.
customer_reviews.author: Brian norris

customer_reviews.title: intex filter cartridges
customer_reviews.text: These filters fit our intex size a filter pump perfectly. The price was wayyy less than the local stores too. This 12 pack is a very good deal and now we'll be set for the whole summer. If these are still available next season we'll surely be buying these again. Oh and the processing and shipping were very fast too a+++.
customer_reviews.author: trapper

customer_reviews.title: Not a Toy but a great pool Filter
customer_reviews.text: Classified as a toy NOT, but it's a great filter and buying in bulk like this saves me plenty when the summer season is here. Considering the cost of buying individual filters in large chain stores this is a great savings and they work fantastically in my intex pool!
customer_reviews.author: Tresses

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: Local big box store has these for $8.89 each. Why pay that much when you can get them for half that price? This is my second order from this vendor and I couldn't be happier. Each time, the product arrived before the estimated arrival date. With prices like these, changing filters every week is easier than trying to clean the old filter.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with price and shipped faster than I anticipated. I knocked a star off because these have to be modified to fit type A pumps. Still happy with it though.
customer_reviews.author: christopher tallman

customer_reviews.title: Large Intex filters
customer_reviews.text: I have an Intex pool so they fit perfectly. Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

product_meta.title: Intex Pool Easy Set Type A Replacement Filter Pump Cartridge (12 Pack) | 29000E
product_meta.description: Keep your pool performing at its best by investing in this 12 pack of Intex Pool Easy Set Type A Replacement Filter Cartridges. Constructed out of 13.5 square feet of high quality Dacron, this filter cartridge was designed to keep your Intex or other compatible filter pumps running longer and stronger. Replace this filter cartridge every 2 weeks for peak performance. For the long healthy life of your pool, invest in this quality Intex Pool Easy Set Type A Replacement Filter Cartridge and let it go to work for you.
feature_bullets: Keep your pool sparkling clean and clear day after day
Replaces Intex 29000E filter cartridge and fits any filter pump that uses Intex 59900 filter cartridges
Intex recommends replacing this filter cartridge as often as every 2 weeks for peak pump performance
This type A filter cartridge is manufactured out of Dacron

For the 500, 530, 800, 1000 & 1500 GPH filter pumps models 28603EG, 28637EG, 28635EG, 28671EG, 58603EG, 58604E, 28635EG, 56635EG, 56636E, 56637E, 56638E & 58623, as well as Intex filter pumps or Krystal Clear filter pumps models 02 & 12R

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars234 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
